Summary: Two star like object coming from the S.W. bearing N.E.
divs: sighting detailsat 7:45 pm i stepped out to retrieve the mail when i saw two star like objects directly above me heading in a northeastern direction. the lead object resembled a low orbit satellite in brightness\size, but the second object was big\bright and seemed to follow the smaller lead objects course exactly, single file. if these objects were at the same altitude as a low orbit satellite then the second object had to be very large, as it seemed to be 2 to 3 times the size of the biggest star in the sky. these objects were moving slowly and took approximately 2 to 3 minutes before they were out of sight, and no sound of jet engines or anything could be heard throughout the entire event. i live in the fresno area, very close to the sierra's.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Clovis
There were no other sightings in Clovis on or around September 8th 2009
